analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol#115) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol#120-122)

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol#450-458) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol#456-458)

InvestorTimeVault.claim (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xb20ce22063d8e1d18e6aefba9602ddc6840d25fc.sol)
